alert.note: Alert for Granite, Green, Ferris, Rattlesnake Mountains; North Big Horn Basin, Worland BLM; South Big Horn Basin, Worland BLM; Upper Wind River Basin, Wind River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued August 28 at 3:11PM MDT until August 30 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... The National Weather Service in Riverton has issued a Fire Weather Watch, which is in effect Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS: Strong southwest wind, low humidity, and above normal temperatures will create erratic fire behavior with existing fires or any new starts. * AFFECTED AREA: In Central WY Fire Zones...283...289. In North Central WY Fire Zones...275...282. * COUNTIES AFFECTED: In Central WY...Fremont...Natrona. In North Central WY...Big Horn...Hot Springs...Park...Washakie. In Southwest WY...Sweetwater. * WIND: West to southwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * HUMIDITY: As low as 10 to 15 percent. * TEMPERATURES: Highs in the 80s.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
